headline: Winnebago, Berkshire buys, US Steel: Trending Tickers
summary: Winnebago Industries (WGO) misses on its fiscal first quarter earnings estimates as CEO Michael Happe cites challenges tied to consumer demand and its dealer networks.. Berkshire Hathaway (BRK-B, BRK-A) has bought up 8.9 million shares of Occidental Petroleum (OXY) and 5 million shares of SiriusXM (SIRI). US Steel (X) slips after lowering its fourth quarter EBITDA outlook. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief here. This post was written by Luke Carberry Mogan.

headline: Warren Buffett Buying Again: Berkshire Hathaway’s Latest Stock Purchases Revealed
summary: The purchases were made Tuesday through Thursday. The Occidental Petroleum buy was the first since June, suggesting Berkshire CEO Warren Buffett now finds the stock attractive.
